body.p: The following functions, which are all provided by ebuild.sh, handle working with the sandbox.

tr.ti: Add one single additional item to the sandbox allowed read list.

Add one single additional item to the sandbox allowed write list. Note: If at all possible, use addpredict instead. Using addwrite is not an appropriate alternative to making your package build sandbox-friendly.
Add one single additional item to the sandbox deny (read/write) list.
Add one single additional item to the sandbox predict (pretend to allow write) list.

body.p: None of these functions accept multiple arguments in one call. The sandbox is recursive, so to allow predicted writes to /foo/bar and /foo/baz, addpredict /foo would be sufficient.
See for details on how the sandbox works. See for how to handle sandbox-related build problems.
